scripts.mochawesome-merge_old: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.mochawesome-merge: node -e "let now = new Date(); let timestamp = now.getFullYear() + '_' + ('0' + (now.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2) + '_' + ('0' + now.getDate()).slice(-2) + '_' + ('0' + ((now.getHours() % 12) || 12)).slice(-2) + '.' + ('0' + now.getMinutes()).slice(-2) + (now.getHours() < 12 ? 'AM' : 'PM'); require('child_process').execSync('npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome-' + timestamp + '.json && npx marge mochawesome-' + timestamp + '.json')"
